Interface Boundary

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Boundary_Raster
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Boundary_Grid_TestingGrid, Boundary_Raster_NetCDF

    public interface Boundary
    Reads boundary (e.g. bathymetry) values from a data source
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

      • getBoundaryDepth

        double getBoundaryDepth(double x,
                      double y)
        Given x and y locations return a depth at that location
        Parameters:
        x - - position in the x direction
        y - - position in the y direction

      • clone

        Boundary clone()
        Clones the BathymetryReader object

      • getPreciseBoundaryDepth

        double getPreciseBoundaryDepth(double x,
                             double y)
        Given x and y locations, return the depth at that location taking into account intracell change.
        Parameters:
        x - - position in the x direction
        y - - position in the y direction
        Returns:
        - the boundary depth at the coordinate location taking into account intracell depth change.

      • setPositiveDown

        void setPositiveDown(boolean positiveDown)
        Sets whether depth values are increasingly positive in a downwards direction (i.e. depth values are positive).
